attributes.action: Make live stock farming in the UK illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All live stock produce methan emissions these emissions are five times more harmful to the environment than CO2. Therefore we believe that live stock farming should be banded as an urgent green issue. This would also reduce the availability and increase the costs of dairy and meet products which are unhealthy. So this one law would improve the health of the nation and environment.
